pr_title: Remove deprecated third-party methods from tests

timeline.message:
Remove deprecated methods from tests

I've noticed that a lot of our tests are using deprecated static methods
from the Hamcrest matchers. While this is not a big deal in any
objective sense, it seems like a small good thing to reduce compilation
warnings and be ready for a new release of the matcher library if we
need to upgrade. I've also switched a few other methods in tests that
have drop-in replacements.

timeline.bodyText:
Since we are changing this, I think using hamcrest will produce a nicer error message if this ever fails:
assertThat(response.getIndices(), Matchers.arrayContaining("index1", "index2"));
timeline.author: rjernst

timeline.message: Use hamcrest matcher instead of assertArrayEquals
